text: Vadimas Petrenko (born 26 March 1974 in Klaipėda) is a Lithuanian professional footballer, playing for FBK Kaunas in the A Lyga. He plays the position of midfielder and is a former member of the Lithuania national football team. ==External links== * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Lithuanian footballers Category:Lithuania international footballers Category:FK Atlantas players Category:FBK Kaunas footballers Category:FK Žalgiris players Category:FK Liepājas Metalurgs players Category:Czech First League players Category:SK Sigma Olomouc players Category:FCI Levadia Tallinn players Category:FK Panerys Vilnius players Category:Lithuanian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Latvia Category:Expatriate footballers in Estonia Category:FC Lokomotiv Nizhny Novgorod players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Lithuanian expatriate sportspeople in Latvia Category:21st- century Ukrainian politicians Category:Association football midfielders
title: Vadimas Petrenko
